text: Hanki ana Kaldia vahe'mo'za kini ne'mofona amanage hu'za kenona hunte'naze. Kini ne'moka tagriku'ma hihoma hunkama hana zana, magore huno ama mopafima mani'nea vahe'mo'a huamara huno onkasamigahie. Kini ne'moka ko'ma ama mopafima hankavenentake hu'za ra zamagima eri'za mani'naza kini vahe'mo'za, e'inahu agenoka zamavune vahe'ma, zamema nentaza vahe'ma, henkama fore hania zanku'ma huama nehaza vahe'mokizmia zamantahi onke'nazankna agenoka kagra tantahinegane.
